full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BRTZAMS PA MTHAR PHYIN PA'I SKABS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA BRGYAD PO 'DI DAG NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @217A *, ,('DI LTAR T'A LA'I TSOS KHUR WANG TSE LDAN BSOD NAMS NAS ^BSTAN RGYUN LA DGONGS TE, KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I 'DUL t'IK RNAM BSHAD NYI MA'I 'OD ZER PAR GSAR GYI DPE CHA MA DPE BYAS PA'I PAR BZHENGS KYI THUGS BZHES GNANG NAS, PAR BRKO'I DO DAM DU SLOB DPON BDE LEGS DPAL BSGO BZHAG GNANG BA DANG, SBYIN BDAG YANG DPON PO RANG NYID DANG, BZANG CHUB GLING MKHAN KHRI BA SPRUL SKU SHES RAB RGYA MTSO, DO DAM PA SLOB SPON BDE LEGS DPAL, RNAMS KYIS GTZOS ZHAL 'DEBS RGYAB MI MANG PO DANG, PAR YIG BRI MI DGE SLONG RIGS 'DZIN SOGS DANG, PAR BRKO MI BSTAN PA, SMAN PA, SOGS MI MANG PO BCAS KYIS PAR BRKOS BGYI BA SGRUB MTSAMS SU, ^GONG GSAL T'A LA'I TSOS KHUR WANG TSE LDAN BSOD NAMS, SLOB DPON BDE LEGS DPAL GNYIS KYIS PAR BYANG SMON PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA ZHIG DGOS TSUL BYUNG BAR BRTEN, LHA LDAN RAB MING 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BRIS PA DE YANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG 'GRO BA BDE BA'I RGYUR 'GYUR CIG ,GSUNG BAR 'DI BZANG CHUB GLING ZHES BYA BA'I MTSAN NYID GRVA TSANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,)
